meanings.definition: A camp set up for workers in the oil industry.
meanings.sent1: The oilcamp provided shelter for the workers during their time in the oil fields.
meanings.sent2: We visited the oilcamp to see where the workers stayed while working in the oil industry.
meanings.sent3: The oilcamp was so crowded that it felt like a bustling little village.
meanings.sent4: The oilcamp stood like a small oasis in the vast desert of the oil fields.
meanings.sent5: The flickering lights of the oilcamp at night were a welcoming sight after a long day's work.

meanings.definition: To establish a camp for workers in the oil industry.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to oilcamp near the new drilling site for the convenience of the workers.
meanings.sent2: They oilcamped quickly to ensure the workers had a place to stay during the project.
meanings.sent3: I oilcamped in the backyard with my friends for a fun camping experience.
meanings.sent4: She oilcamped the area with efficiency, making sure everything was ready for the workers.
meanings.sent5: The team oilcamped in record time, impressing their supervisors with their speed.
